an10.80:4.1: “Mendicants, there are these ten methods to get rid of resentment.
an10.80:4.3: Thinking: ‘They did wrong by me, but what can I do?’ you get rid of resentment. Thinking: ‘They are doing wrong by me …’ … ‘They will do wrong by me …’ … ‘They did wrong by someone I love …’ …
an10.80:4.4: ‘They are doing wrong by someone I love …’
an10.80:4.5: ‘They will do wrong by someone I love …’ …
an10.80:4.6: They are helping someone I dislike …’ …
an10.80:4.7: Thinking: ‘They will help someone I dislike, but what can I do?’ you get rid of resentment. And you don’t get angry for no reason.
an10.80:4.8: These are the ten ways of getting rid of resentment.”
